member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <Root> <!--CONTRACT--> <DBO name="pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}" type="U"> <Install> IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id=OBJECT_ID(N'dbo.[pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}]')) BEGIN CREATE TABLE [dbo].[pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}]( [LINE_NO] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_NO] [nvarchar](25) NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_DATE] [int] NOT NULL, [CONTRACTOR] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [CONSTRUCTION_UNIT] [varchar](15) [rest of string was truncated]";.
